entry.tran: 喧嚣的；热闹的；充满喧闹哄笑声的
entry.def: When events or people are uproarious, they make people laugh in a very noisy way.

example.ex: He had spent several uproarious evenings at the Embassy Club...
example.tran: 他在使馆俱乐部度过了几个狂欢夜。

example.ex: The noise of talk and laughter was uproarious.

means.word_mean: 2. marked by or causing boisterous merriment or convulsive laughter;
